title: CTRL+ALT+END inside RDP sessions (Inception)
author: TheDevilDan
body_snippet:
Hi,

Key Combinations --> ENABLE (true, yes)
Send "Windows Button" --> OK
Send "CTRL+ALT+END" --> NOK

Impossible to send CTRL + ALT + (END) or (SUPPR) or (INSERT).

Computer : Layer 0
Context : I'm connecting with my computer on a virtual desktop with VMWare Horizon (Layer 1)
Then, I'm connecting to a RDP desktop (Layer 2)
And then, Connecting with MRemoteNG to RDP desktop (Layer 3)

I enabled key combinations, the "windows" key is working now, but impossible to do the CTRL + ALT +...

comments.author: sparerd
comments.snippet: I think this may be similar to what is requested in #1349

comments.author: HelpITru
comments.snippet:

See how this is work in another manager from microsoft

notes: AI triage (claude-retry): CTRL+ALT+END not passed through in nested RDP sessions â€” duplicate of #1349 (key combinations in nested RDP), confirmed by maintainer sparerd.
